items/fish/misc/treasure_box_copper/desc: An uncommon copper treasure box. Open it to find out what's inside!
items/fish/misc/treasure_box_gold/descri: A very rare golden treasure box. Open it to find out what's inside!

items/fish/misc/treasure_box_wood/descri: A common wooden treasure box. Open it to find out what's inside!
